> Okay, =
despite pissing all over the idea of pipelined HTTP requests at

lier point, I've come across a situation where this is

ary.  That is, a situation where it would be nice to

ttp://x/1?GET=3Dhttp://y/2?GET=3Dhttp://z/3

Isn't this=
 just what URL-Encoding is for?

It's slightly more complex in that you nee=
d to "quote" the Nth URL in N layers of URL-Encoding. For example, your URL=
 should be:

http://x/1?GET=3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fy%2F2%3FGET%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252=
Fz%252F3


Regards

John Fletcher
